property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever there is a successful run on this server, trace4 - if successful, the Runner cannot access any cards other than Ash 2X3ZB9CY for the remainder of this run.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Eyes forward please."

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you score Braintrust, place 1 agenda counter on it for every 2 advancement tokens on it over 3. The rez cost of all ice is lowered by 1 for each agenda counter on Braintrust.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [Subroutine] Trace3 - If successful, the Corp gains 3[Credits]. [Subroutine] Trace2 - If successful, end the run.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A symbol of commerce, but beware its bite.

property.name: Instructions
property.value: [Subroutine] Trace 3. If successful, gain 3 [Credits].||[Subroutine] Trace 2. If successful, end the run.

property.name: Faction
property.value: The Weyland Consortium

property.name: Rules
property.value: [Trash]: Choose a piece of ice. The Corp must pay 2 [Credits] as an additional cost to rez that ice until the end of the turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Named after Hernando Cortez, a former Weyland technician convicted of smuggling company tech. He still collected his pension while in prison, the last beneficiary of a loophole in Weyland's standard employment contract.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you rez Draco, you may pay X [Credits] to place X power counters on it. Draco has +1 strength for each power counter on it. [Subroutine] Trace2 - If successful, give the Runner 1 tag and end the run.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Victos dracones numquam deride.

property.name: Subtitle
property.value: Stronger Together

property.name: Rules
property.value: All bioroid ice has +1 strength.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A Different Breed of Machine.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Place 2 virus counters on Imp when it is installed. Once per turn, you may remove 1 hosted virus counter to trash a card you access at no cost (even if it cannot normally be trashed).

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Something wicked this way comes.

property.name: Rules
property.value: The runner may spend [Click] to break any subroutine on Janus 1.0. [Subroutine] Do 1 brain damage. [Subroutine] Do 1 brain damage. [Subroutine] Do 1 brain damage. [Subroutine] Do 1 brain damage.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Face your fear

property.name: Rules
property.value: You have 1 additional [Click] to spend each turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Sometimes employee reviews took a little bit longer than anticipated.

property.name: Rules
property.value: 1 [Credits]: Break any number of barrier subroutines.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Weaponizing the heavens, one star at a time.

property.name: Rules
property.value: 2 [Credits]: Break code gate subroutine. 2 [Credits]: +3 strength.

property.name: Instructions
property.value: 2 [Credits]: Break code gate subroutine.||2 [Credits]: +3 strength.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Place 4 power counters on Plascrete Carapace when it is installed. When there are no power counters left on Plascrete Carapace, trash it. Hosted power counter: Prevent 1 meat damage.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you score Project Atlas, place 1 agenda counter on it for each advancement token on it over 3. Hosted agenda counter: Search R&D for 1 card, reveal it, and add it to HQ. Shuffle R&D.

property.name: Faction
property.value: The Weyland Consortium

property.name: Rules
property.value: [Click]: Trace2 - If successful, give the Runner 1 tag.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We're gonna need a bigger room."

property.name: Rules
property.value: [Subroutine] You and the Runner secretly spend 0 [Credits], 1 [Credits], or 2 [Credits]. Reveal spent credits. End the run if you and the Runner spent a different number of credits.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Sometimes uniqueness is overrated.

property.name: Rules
property.value: +1 [Memory Unit], 2 [Recurring Credits] Use these credits to pay for using icebreakers. Whenever there is a successful trace during a run, suffer 1 brain damage. Limit one console per player.

property.name: Rules
property.value: +1 [Link] [Trash]: Choose an icebreaker. That icebreaker has +2 strength until the end of the turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "What causes an Artifical Intellegence to turn on its master? Is it because its directives have been altered by some external source? Or, by giving them agency to adapt, have we fated them to revolt?" - Emilio Harris, Creators and the Created

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you rez TMI, trace2 - if unsuccessful, derez TMI. [Subroutine] End the run.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A collection of cast-off cyberjunk. But it doesn't stay junk for long.

property.name: Subtitle
property.value: Master Gamer

property.name: Rules
property.value: 3 [Recurring Credits] Use these credits to trash cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Running is the ultimate game, and I get to make all the rules."

property.name: Rules
property.value: If you have at least 2 [Link], the memory cost of ZU.13 Key Master is 0, even if it is not installed. 1 [Credits]: Break code gate subroutine. 1 [Credits]: +1 strength.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He always uses the same key.

property.name: Instructions
property.value: 1 [Credits]: Break code gate subroutine.||1 [Credits]: +1 strength.
